2006.10.25

[Test Data: Concentric ring2]
100 points in 3-D space. Data points are generated in sphere-coordinate, P=(rho,phi,theta), and then transformed into Cartesian coordinate P'=(x,y,z). (See wkipedia for more details))

class       rho             phi         theta
0     abs(norm(1,0.5))  unif[0,pi] unif[0,2*pi]
1     abs(norm(2,0.5))  unif[0,pi] unif[0,2*pi]

So, only rho=sqrt(x^2+y^2+z^2) have significant influence on the class label.
